title: Looking for "wave" font
content:
Hello I'm looking for the "wave" font (found on the milkshake drink "wave") or a font like it   
 ![wave.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012040705im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/2854.jpg)
